title: Paul Sahre
description: Debbie talks to designer Paul Sahre about the power of saying no to clients, and about a meeting with Steely Dan that went off the rails.
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talks to designer Paul Sahre about the power of saying no to clients, and about a meeting with Steely Dan that went off the rails.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
